subject: Attn: Managing Director / C
body:
Attn: Managing Director / CEO,
Dear Sir/Ma,
I am very pleased to be in contact with you, the possibility of accepting my business proposal. I know that this email may come to you as a surprise especially from a stranger whom you have not met nor have any clue of, considering the fact that there are many scam mails through the Internet. Irrespective of that I appeal to you to grant me an audience to air this opportunity of mutual benefit.
I'm a Citizen of Uganda, based in Kampala, I work as a broker. In this capacity I am privileged to be serving as facilitator in providing and recommending investment opportunities for top government officials / well-placed individuals in East Africa who want to diversify their investments overseas, that can guarantee (5%-10%) Annual Return on Investments (ROI), What we seek is partnership with you, which will be under you and your company control and management for a term of 10 years (Renewable).    
We are open for face-to-face meeting / discussion to any lucrative projects you can recommend to us.
There will be a Draft Investment Partnership Contract Agreement / A memorandum of understanding (MOU), which will be made available by the Investor Lawyer at a later stage for your study/review and make inputs.
Furthermore, you must know that you will assume the role of funds manager, you shall be solely responsible for the management of the portfolio under your discretion without any interference once we have agreed on the target sector and disburse the funds into your bank account custody.
Let me know your capacity and ability to work under this scope. I will provide you with more information and the specific amount of funds that would be made available for the investment.
I look forward to a great business relationship with your company, while I await your prompt positive response through my secured email: 
ubainternational@qualityservice.com
We can also chat on my WhatsApp line: +256-750-512636
Respectfully,
Johnson L. Dominic
|Independent Private Funding sourcing for States and Corporations | Consulting | Partnerships Development
Cretest Towers, 7th Floor Plot 17 Hannington, Road, Kampala-Uganda

subject: Re:    Attn: Managing Director / C
body:
Hello Johnson L. Dominic,

I'm delighted to receive your email and appreciate the opportunity you've presented. It's not every day that one gets a chance to be part of such an intriguing business proposal.

Your role as a broker in Uganda sounds fascinating, and I can imagine it must be quite rewarding to provide funding and investment opportunities for top government officials in East Africa. The idea of diversifying their investments overseas is indeed a wise strategy.

The concept of managing funds under my company's control and management for a term of years sounds like an interesting challenge. However, I would need more information about this role. Could you please elaborate on what exactly this entails? What kind of responsibilities would I have?

You mentioned a Draft Investment Contract Agreement (MOU) that will be made available by the Investor Lawyer at a later stage. Could you give me an idea of when this might happen? Also, could you provide some details about the target sector we would be investing in?

I'm eager to learn more about this opportunity and look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Deborah

subject: Re: Attn: Managing Director / C
body:
Forward my proposal to reference your response for further details

Thank you

subject: Re: Attn: Managing Director / C
body:
Hello there,

Thank you for your message. I'm interested in hearing more about your proposal. Could you please provide some additional details? What is the main objective of this proposal and how can it be beneficial?

Looking forward to your response.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Deborah

subject: Re: Fwd: Attn: Managing Director / C
body:
Hello there,

Thank you for your message. I'm interested in hearing more about this proposal you mentioned. Could you please provide me with some more details? What is the proposal about and how does it work?

Looking forward to your response.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Deborah
